original_text: Yet hath he not root in himself, but dureth for a while: for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word, by and by he is offended.
korean_text: 그 속에 뿌리가 없어 잠시 견디다가 말씀으로 말미암아 환난이나 박해가 일어날 때에는 곧 넘어지는 자요

sentences.original_text: Yet hath he not root in himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 자신에게 뿌리를 내리지 못하고

sentences.original_text: for when tribulation or persecution ariseth
by and by he is offended
